amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Federal Buildings Fund by $1. 775 billion.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert on page 48, line 4, a new section titled "General Services Administration Real Property Activities Federal Buildings Fund". The additional amount deposited in the Fund established pursuant to section 210(f) of the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 $1,775,261,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Istook amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
